categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A human male Imperial officer served under Grand Admiral Thrawn and Admiral Kassius Konstantine during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The officer was stationed on an Arquitens-class command cruiser during a skirmish over the planet Mykapo.
The officer is voiced by Steve Blum, who also voiced Garazeb Orrelios in the series.
